Sant Medir

March 9, 2013

Sant Medir is the patron saint for showering sweets on children in the streets. Rightly, he is celebrated with music and parades.

Riu is slightly stunned by the music, horses, and free sweets from the sky.

Hmmm, lollipop.

Sweets everywhere.

Hmmm, sweets.
